Ah yes, the sign of a true winner: obsessively begging others for validation then throwing a hissy fit when you don't get your way.

Trump invited modi over to white house when Modi visited Canada during G7. Asim Munir was in white house during same time.

Idea was to force a handshake and get him a nobel prize as a peacemaker. Modi knew the invite was a trap and excused himself after G7.

Trump really thinks a few sneaky tricks and jokes could bring peace.
What a petulant child
The issue with Trump getting the Nobel Peace Prize is that it reduces the value of the award significantly.  If Trump gets one, many people will consider the award meaningless.

“Robert F. Kennedy Jr., the secretary of health and human services, is endangering the health of the American people now and into the future. He must resign,” Senator Bernie Sanders writes in a guest essay for Times Opinion. He continues:

>The reality is that Secretary Kennedy has profited from and built a career on sowing mistrust in vaccines. Now, as head of H.H.S., he is using his authority to launch a full-blown war on science, on public health and on truth itself.

>What will this mean for the health and well-being of the American people?

>Short term, it will be harder for Americans to get lifesaving vaccines. Already, the Trump administration has effectively taken away Covid vaccines from many healthy younger adults and kids, unless they fight their way through our broken health care system. This means more doctor’s visits, more bureaucracy and more people paying higher out-of-pocket costs — if they can manage to get a vaccine at all.

>Covid is just the beginning. Mr. Kennedy’s next target may be the childhood immunization schedule, the list of recommended vaccines that children receive to protect them from diseases like measles, chickenpox and polio. The danger here is that diseases that have been virtually wiped out because of safe and effective vaccines will resurface and cause enormous harm.

Read the full piece [here, for free](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/08/30/opinion/bernie-sanders-robert-f-kennedy-jr-resign-hhs.html?unlocked_article_code=1.iE8.5dvu.2GvrGe3Y6PY7&smid=re-nytopinion), even without a Times subscription.
RFK Jr sure did destroy what was left the Kennedy mystique at light speed.  JFK's vision powered America to the moon and back.  RFK Jr's vision is powering American's to early graves. Forever.

I lived in Atlanta for almost 10 years. One of my best friends married a CDC doctor while I was there. I hung out with a lot of CDC people as a result. Very serious people who were proud of where they worked and their mission. Lord help us.
This whole fucking administration needs to resign.

German Chancellor Friedrich Merz said Germany is “already in conflict with Russia,” pointing to cyberattacks, infrastructure sabotage, and disinformation campaigns. 

He warned that Putin aims to rebuild the Soviet Union, stressing that Germany must stay vigilant.
We are not in conflict. We are at war, and we are not fighting back

Russia will continue to harass Europe because it chooses not to respond with strength. A good example is the drones. Anything entering European airspace must be shot down immediately, and any other action will be seen as weakness and result in the same outcome.
Ban the AFD, ramp up support for Ukraine and push for a european nuclear deterrent in conjuction with Poland and the Baltics. That would be a good start
Russia should not even be allowed to use our internet… every action is either overt or covert hostility.

My disappointment is immeasurable and my day is ruined.
Of course not these people are so leaky. We would know while he was actively taking his last breath.
Yeah this may be true, but what is also true is that the idea he might be deathly sick wasn't outside the range of accepted possibilities.
I actually kind of prefer this outcome; it's rare to have the opportunity to see people openly celebrating your demise.
India just became the largest seller of diesel to Ukraine. Lol

Their rich man's companies are publicly listed, with many Western fund houses invested and reaping profits. 

The US, Europe, and China trade heavily with them in gas, critical minerals, and uranium. The US struck a mineral deal with Ukraine during the middle of war and even a secret oil deal with Russia. 

The reality is, the oil lobby backing Trump wants to control the market, and India is getting in the way. Europe should decide where to buy oil from and not the U.S.

But if an Indian business did the same, it would be labeled as funding the war; what hypocrisy.


**Edit:**
Some refuse to believe the secret oil deal I mentioned, so here’s the link. It has been reported by Reuters and several other well-known media outlets:

https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/us-russian-officials-discussed-energy-deals-alongside-latest-ukraine-peace-talks-2025-08-26/

How come same incorrect talking points are used by Peter Navarro, Scott Bessent, Reuters and now Kyiv Post?

Indian state refining companies have bought more Russian crude than RIL after US decided that India and other countries could buy Russian crude at a discount to stop inflation. Western countries including Ukraine have sold weapons to Pakistan which has been used to kill Indians, don't think the irony has been lost on Indian people.

Edited to add statement of outgoing US ambassador to India about Russian crude purchase-

[https://www.statecraft.co.in/article/not-just-us-whole-world-wanted-countries-to-buy-russian-oil-ambassador-garcetti-on-india-s-imports](https://www.statecraft.co.in/article/not-just-us-whole-world-wanted-countries-to-buy-russian-oil-ambassador-garcetti-on-india-s-imports)
Are we seriously forgetting how the US was (and still is) trying to get an energy deal for Exxon in the Alaska summit? The US cares only about self interests.

He's also lost 18 billion USD in net worth since last October.  
Not exactly getting rich off his current investments.

It's a body double, his ears look different, he's a robot, I saw mechanical parts fall out of his pant legs, he's a lizard person.
